name: ChristianFamilyFinanceTipsFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: If you don’t control your money, it will begin to control you. Don’t wander aimlessly through life wondering if you'll ever get caught up and were all your money goes. Danielle Tate, also known as the Sex and Money Mrs. tackles to tough topic of family finances to help you find freedom from money troubles and manage your money God's way. Get practical, biblical tips on family finances each week from author, speaker, and former budgeting coach, Danielle Tate.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
